level.heading: Agency affirmative action plan--Program for securing equal employment opportunity.
level.text: The plan shall further state what actions the agency is taking to secure the equal employment opportunity within the agency of the groups enumerated in § 1-521.03, and of the aging, the young, persons with disabilities, and the homosexual citizens of the District, whether such citizens be actual or potential employees of the District government.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-169 substituted "persons with disabilities" for "the handicapped".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-63, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-521.01.
For history of Law 19-169, see notes under § 1-307.02.
